title: Life of Pi
author: yann-martel
summary: Pi Patel survives 227 days stranded on a lifeboat in the Pacific Ocean with a Bengal tiger named Richard Parker. Winner of the Man Booker Prize, adapted into an Oscar-winning 2012 film by Ang Lee.

attribution.note: Book data from Open Library (openlibrary.org), part of Internet Archive.

description: After the tragic sinking of a cargo ship, one solitary lifeboat remains bobbing on the wild, blue Pacific. The scene is set for one of the most extraordinary works of fiction in recent years.
